    FDAApiService
    This class is responsible for directly querying the openFDA API to fetch drug label information.
    Medication
    The Medication class represents a medication with various properties such as FDA ID, brand name, generic name, manufacturer, active ingredients, and pharmacologic classes.
    MedicationInfoPage
     
    MedicationOverviewController
     
    MedicationParser
    The MedicationParser class provides methods to parse medication data returned by API queries.
    MedicationSearchController
    The MedicationSearchController class is responsible for linking the UI view with the logic for handling the search functionality contained in the MedicationSearchModel.
    MedicationSearchModel
    This class provides methods for interacting with the medication-related tables in the database.
    OpenFDAClient
    The OpenFDAClient class provides functionality to search for medications using the openFDA API and parse the results.
